summary: DRIVING FROM AUSTIN TO SAN ANTONIO MOSTLY AT 70MPH. NOTICED BRAKE, ABS, SLIP INDICATOR AND LOW PRESSURE TIRE INDICATOR LIGHTS CAME ON. STOPPED TO CHECK UNDER HOOD, BRAKING WAS NORMAL. BRAKE FLUID LEVELS WERE NORMAL BUT ABS ACTUATOR SEEM TO BE CYCLING EVEN WHILE MOTIONLESS. TESTED BRAKING AND EXPERIENCED NO PROBLEM. DROVE BACK TO AUSTIN. TOOK CAR TO DEALER THE NEXT DAY, WAS TOLD IT WAS A LEAK IN THE ACTUATOR BODY AND IT HAD TO BE REPLACED. COST $3580.00. HAVE DEFERRED REPAIRS.
